scene_description_enriched: The Virgin Mary, depicted with a blue mantle and white veil, stands on a crescent moon, surrounded by four angels. Two angels on the sides are playing musical instruments: one a lute, the other a pipe. The other two angels, one on the upper left and one on the lower right, are kneeling and looking towards the Virgin. The background is a golden, radiant sky, suggesting a divine or celestial setting. The scene is framed by a decorative border.
